Class ClaimMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.mappers.ClaimMapper

  • public class ClaimMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The ClaimMapper helps us save all the data related to a claim.

        public void saveClaimData(int claimId,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.Object data)
        Saves the claim data, one field at a time. The field it saves is associated with the key. The warning is suppressed as we will always know the object type of the destination list, tag list, and expense list.
